| HistoryText             = The Board of Directors of '''[[Donahue Development (Earth-616)|Donahue Development]]''' passed under [[Anthony Stark (Earth-616)|Tony Stark]]'s control after [[Trevor Donahue (Earth-616)|Trevor Donahue]] left the company in his hands, eventually being rebranded '''Stark Enterprises'''.{{r|Iron Man Vol 3 86}}

After Tony Stark's violent performance at the [[United Nations (Earth-616)|United Nations]] meeting,{{r|Avengers #500}} the Stark Enterprises Board, led by Chairman [[G.B. (Earth-616)|G.B.]], proposed to change the company's name in order to avoid an affiliation with Stark's name bad reputation. However, during that meeting, [[Clarence Ward (Earth-616)|Clarence Ward]], an old rival of Tony Stark, broke into the Executive Boardroom dressed up as [[Iron Man]], killing all the directors.{{r|Iron Man Vol 3 86}}
